sentences.en: An e-mail is already circulating amongst news staff calling for voluntary redundancies.
sentences.cn: 在新闻部员工中已经在转发一封电子邮件,呼吁大家自愿裁汰.

sentences.en: Apna Arts has achieved more with voluntary workers in three years than most organisations with paid workers have achieved in ten.
sentences.cn: “我们”艺术中心依靠志愿者在3年内取得的成就超过了大多数雇用受薪员工的机构10年中取得的成绩。

sentences.en: Attendance on the course is purely voluntary.
sentences.cn: 听这门课纯粹是自愿的。

sentences.en: Attention is drawn to a special voluntary course in Commercial French.
sentences.cn: 一门特别的商务法语选修课引起了大家的关注。

sentences.en: He is still involved in voluntary work promoting local enterprise.
sentences.cn: 他仍在从事促进当地创业的志愿者工作。

sentences.en: He'd been working at the local hostel for the handicapped on a voluntary basis.
sentences.cn: 他曾在当地的残疾人救助站当过义工。

sentences.en: It has been largely through the voluntary sector that the needs of victims have been met.
sentences.cn: 受害者的需要主要是通过志愿组织予以满足的。

sentences.en: Moreover, extensive use of voluntary recalls can undercut agency accountability.
sentences.cn: 此外, 大量利用自愿撤回会削弱行政机关的责任心.

sentences.en: Most of these specialized schools are provided by voluntary organizations.
sentences.cn: 这些专业学校大多由志愿组织建立。

sentences.en: Perhaps doing voluntary work is more your line?
sentences.cn: 也许你更喜欢做志愿工作？

sentences.en: She does a lot of voluntary work for the Red Cross.
sentences.cn: 她为红十字会做大量的志愿工作。

sentences.en: Some local authorities and voluntary organizations also run workshops for disabled people.
sentences.cn: 一些当地机构和志愿组织也为残疾人开设了一些工场。

sentences.en: That he bumped me is voluntary.
The scheme, due to begin next month, will be voluntary.
sentences.cn: 定于下个月开始实施的方案是自愿性质的。

sentences.en: Voluntary redundancies and natural wastage will cut staff numbers to the required level.
sentences.cn: 自愿离职和自然减员将使员工数量减至所需的水平.

sentences.en: We depend solely upon our voluntary helpers.
sentences.cn: 我们完全依靠我们的志愿者。

sentences.en: Workers are being encouraged to take voluntary redundancy.

phrases.tran_cn: 随意动作；有意动作；自主行为

trans.tran_cn: 自愿的，志愿组织/协会/机构等
trans.tran_en: done willingly and without being forced

trans.tran_cn: （教堂中的）管风琴演奏曲，即兴曲
